A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Apart from the white and red mineral planet\, I hated EVERYTHING in this movie! And they even overdid the \"red theme\" in the promotion posters. I could tell just from the pretentious color palette that this film was going to suck. People keep calling this film \"beautiful\". I can't think what they're talking about except for the planet mentioned above. What else is \"beautiful\"? Garbage.
